definition: unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
(negative prefix)/not/no
to know/to be aware
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
bad/wicked/evil/Kangxi radical 78

sentences.english: In fact, he often changes girlfriend, for he doesn't know chalk from cheese.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他经常换女友，因为他不知好歹。

sentences.english: You are an ungrateful nephew and you will not get anything…
sentences.chinese: 你是一个不知好歹的侄子，你什么也别想得到。

sentences.english: It is a mistake to lavish kindness to ungrateful people.
sentences.chinese: 对不知好歹的人释以善意是愚蠢的。

sentences.english: Make the eyes of Mo inside profoundly very thick disappointment, for this person of stubborn.
sentences.chinese: 弄墨的眼里透出浓浓的失望，对于这个人的不知好歹。

sentences.english: You were kind enough to let me spend the night, so I do not mean to sound ungrateful.
sentences.chinese: 你们好心留我过夜，所以我不想说些不知好歹的话。

definition: unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
fail to appreciate sb's kindness/not know how to appreciate favors
not knowing when to come or leave (idiom); with no sense of propriety
to act recklessly (idiom)
to refuse a toast only to be forced to drink a forfeit/fig. to hesitate to do sth until forced to do even more
pinyin: jing4 jiu3 bu4 chi1 chi1 fa2 jiu3

definition: to show no understanding of the times (idiom); cannot adapt to current circumstances/not amenable to reason
not to know the immensity of heaven and earth/an exaggerated opinion of one's own abilities
pinyin: bu4 zhi1 tian1 gao1 di4 hou4

definition: to bully intolerably (idiom)
shameful/absolutely disgraceful!
stupid/stubborn/pigheaded
bastard/wretch/scoundrel
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
to overestimate one's capabilities
to fail to see the larger issue (idiom)/to fail to grasp the big picture
slut/cheap person
